name: Winkeltje: The Little Shop
description: Winkeltje is a game about building, decorating and running a small shop in the days of old. You will deal with the day-to-day business as the owner of your very own store.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64 bit) Processor: i5 6300U Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 520 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space
